price: Hanyuma wongere wubure amaso ubugira kabiri, amaso aragaruka yamwaye kandi yacitse intege (kuko nta nenge yabonye).
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيۡنِ يَنقَلِبۡ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ خَاسِئٗا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma ir'jiʿi al-baṣara karratayni yanqalib ilayka al-baṣaru khāsi-an wahuwa ḥasīrun
